name: Bring Back The Sun - Right Before Release (Linux only)
name_original: Bring Back The Sun - Right Before Release (Linux only)
description:
Bring Back the Sun is a short and challenging 2D Platformer. The goal is obvious - bring back the sun! 

The focus lies solely on jumping right. No enemys, no spikes, no wall jumps, no double jumps. Only simple jumps will get you through the levels. 

Features

  • A pure experience
  • Challenging but not hardcore
  • Jump through 40 levels
  • Loading in no time
  • Minimalistic graphics
  • Atmospheric soundtrack

You can expect 1-3 hours playtime for your first run depending on your skill level.

This is the first release of Bring Back The Sun. It is only available for Linux at the moment but it will be available for Windows when the 1.0 version is released in a couple of weeks!

The game is complete but I will add and change sounds, add additional languages and polish minor parts of the game in the next couple of weeks :)

The game will also be released on Steam, you can also wishlist it there :D

The 1.0 version will cost 3$ or 2.7$ with launch discount on Steam and Itch.io! But of course early buyers get all updates for free!
